venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description: We've pulled together a Feb '10 meetup at the last second. We hope you can attend. Peter Ricci will be presenting Zooproperty.com and showcasing a number of real estate WordPress themes and plugins built to work with this SAAS system. He will also be launching a competition to build a WordPress Theme using the ZOO API. Zooproperty.com has built several impressive services using WordPress, and this talk should be of interest to a broad spectrum of WordPress users.
item.name: Boston WordPress February 2010 Meetup: Zooproperty.com
